item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Andre and I’m the author of this website. I made it to help me and you to configure stuff we often forget. So, there you have it… enjoy!

item.title: Kweebs
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
